metadata.title: CVE-2022-41981 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: A stack-based buffer overflow vulnerability exists in the TGA file formatparser of OpenImageIO v2.3.19.0. A specially-crafted targa file can lead toout of bounds read and write on the process stack, which can lead toarbitrary code execution. An attacker can provide a malicious file totrigger this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: openimageio package in esm-apps/jammy is affected and may need fixing.
